content: Hello, I'm trying to install Elan using elan-init.ps1 on Windows, but I'm getting Elan failed with error code -1073741515 - has anybody encountered it before and knows what to do? :(
Haha, me too a year later. Windows is fun.

More specifically, linking to this message. You need to installation the Visual Studio redistributable package. Many people avoid noticing this step because it is commonly installed already on Windows systems.
And hopefully elan will be adjusted soon to avoid this requirement.
